tinify_key_message: Set your tinypng.com key to auto compress images
ga_config_sign_in: Sign in to your Google Analytics Account
base_admin_url_message:
Some servers do not report correctly the URL where Cuppa CMS is installed, this can affect some features of Cuppa CMS.
If it detects that the URL is not specified, use this field to expecificar the correct URL where you installed Cuppa CMS.
editor_mode_tooltip: Select the editor mode for Ace editor
table_log_empty_message: In this moment there aren't data to display here
stats_has_updated: Has updated the item #id on table #table
stats_is_updating: Is updating the item #id on table #table
stats_has_created: Has created a new item #id on table #table
stats_has_deleted: Has deleted the item #id on table #table
write_a_reference_message: Write a new reference language (ej. en, es, fr, ...)
analytics_view_help: To get a fast summary from Google Analytics, specify the view ID
tracking_codes_help: Paste personal tracking codes like: Google Analytics, Google AdWords, etc.
menu_without_info_message: This menu is empty, please add some info.
title_tab_tooltip: Fill this field if you want personalized the title tab.
alias_language_reference: Language reference file :: If is selected, the alias will make reference to the value specified in the file 'language/administrator.json' for the Back-End or the file than you set in the Front-End
title: Title
alias_text: Unique reference to menu item (P/key string). Some utilities is facilitate the implementation of Friendly URL  and SEO in your frontpage.
title_language_reference: Language reference file :: If is selected, the label will make reference to the value specified in the file 'language/com_table_manager.json' or the file specified on: Language file reference
comment_select_enable_filters: * This filters will be displayed in the list
comment_independent_options_rules: If this is selected, the extra parametres or rules like permissions or filters will be created independents
no_filters_available_messages: This table don't have available filters to configurate.
table_without_info_message: This table is empty, please add some info.
csv_column_separator_message: Specify the column separator when will export the data
comment_global_encode: This parameter affect the verification of login panel . If this parameter is changed remember update the password for encrypt it with the new specification before of close your session. The default value is sha1Salt
comment_token: If this is blank, the token is generated automatically
comment_secure_login:
Security improve at start session. To start session you should pass a additional param by the URL.

Example: http://www.domain.com/administrator/?secure=value
comment_secure_login_failed: If the GET secure_word is wrong redirect to?
load_ajax_message: Specify these fields, If you want that the info load with ajax
file_path_message: Specify the path of the file to load
template_list_path_tooltip:
Specify the file path .js for load a template list in the editor TinyMCE.
Example: ../html/templates/template_list.js
personal_table_name_tooltop: Language reference file :: If is selected, the personal table name will make reference to the value specified in the file 'language/com_table_manager.json' or the file specified on: Language file reference
language_file_reference_tooltip:
Complete this field with the name of language file, if you want personalized the language of this table.
Example: new_language_file
add_menu_tooltip: add menu item for admin this table
style_css_tooltip:
Specify the file path css for use styles in the editor TinyMCE.
Example: ../css/template.css
item_is_being_updated: This item is being updated by #name# and don't should be modified at this time
show_the_character_indicator_on: Show the character indicator nested on
show_nested_information_message: Specify these fields, If you want that the info be showing nested
global_encode_message: If global_encode is selected, the CMS will take the default value specified in general config
password_current_encode_message: If you has been changed the configuration of the encode, specify the encoding used above
password_new_write: You should write a new password
password_error_message: Error to change the password, please try again
password_changed_correctly: Your password has been changed correctly
label: Label
alert_new_table: Please, select a table of the list
name: Name
no_file_selected_message: To edit any file, select a item from the left list to edit it.
no_item_selected_message: To edit any item, select it from the left list to edit it.
message_information: In this section you can create and manage language files ​​for use in the back-end or front-end. You can also use these files to specify general resources should vary according to the selected language
select_a_file_in_the_list: Select a file in the list
login_message: Use a valid username and password to gain access to the administrator
forgot_password_message: Please send us your email and we'll reset your password

left_panel_table_manager_text: Administrate tables of your data base is easy and quick. You can use Table Manager to link up the table and auto create the form.
left_panel_user_manage_text: Create additional users and groups, and add access privileges of these groups.
left_panel_menu_manager_text: Administrate differents menus, including the admin menu like you want. Also it possible add specific and custom permissions, relating it to diferents user groups.
left_panel_general_configuration_text: Manage the general params for Cuppa CMS, like Database Settings, File Settings and Other Settings.
left_panel_user_accounts_text:
Manage the users information.

For add more info to the user form:
1. Edit the fisic table in the Data Base how you want afand.
2. Go to: Settings > Table Manager, Edit users table.
left_panel_user_groups_text: Create and edit the diferents groups, and the access privileges of these groups.
left_panel_menu_items_text:
Manage the diferents levels of your menus, also you can change the order of this and administrate the permissions by group.

For add new permissions types go to Settings > Prmissions types
